definition[0]: someone who gives money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in
example[1]: Dr Win was a major contributor to the research.
definition[1]: someone who writes a story, song, speech etc that forms part of a larger work such as a newspaper, book, broadcast, recording etc
definition[2]: someone or something that helps to cause something to happen
example[3]: Cars are still one of the principal contributors to air pollution.
example[4]: Nearly half of contributors changed from one pension fund to another last year.
